holidays.title: Distaff Day
holidays.description: There are some amazing things to discover about Distaff Day, and you’ll find them here.

holidays.title: Harlem Globetrotter’s Day
holidays.description: Today we celebrate the Harlem Globetrotters — one of the world’s greatest basketball teams!

holidays.title: I Am a Mentor Day
holidays.description: “A mentor is someone who allows you to see the hope inside yourself.” — Oprah Winfrey

holidays.title: I’m Not Going To Take It Anymore Day
holidays.description: Big changes can occur when people are empowered to stand up for themselves.

holidays.title: Mahayana New Year
holidays.description: Celebrating one of the main branches of Buddhism.

holidays.title: National Bobblehead Day
holidays.description: We bet you there's a bobblehead version of any famous person you can think of.

holidays.title: National Pass Gas Day
holidays.description: Passing gas is one of those things that will make anyone giggle, from children to adults.

holidays.title: National Tempura Day
holidays.description: Celebrating tempura is tastier than you think. We will show you just how much!

holidays.title: Old Rock Day
holidays.description: Remember the Earth’s incredible history and pay tribute to the geologists who help us understand it.

holidays.title: Orthodox Christmas Day
holidays.description: Stay in the festive spirit as we celebrate the world’s most renowned holiday once again.

holidays.title: Blue Ivy Carter’s Birthday
holidays.description: Blue Ivy Carter became the youngest person to feature in a Billboard-charting song.

holidays.title: Camille Rowe’s Birthday
holidays.description: Camille Rowe is a gorgeous creature; we see why Harry Styles couldn’t stop singing about her.

holidays.title: Clix’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented eSports player continues to be a role model for millions of “Fortnite” fans worldwide.

holidays.title: Lamar Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This quarterback’s mindset, attitude, focus, and dedication are exemplary! Learn more with us.

holidays.title: Lewis Hamilton’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hamilton’s often praised for his ability to make few to no mistakes on the race track.

holidays.title: Nicolas Cage’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this Oscar-winning actor, the word ‘fear’ is not in his vocabulary.

holidays.title: Rand Paul’s Birthday
holidays.description: He stands out and is ready to defend his ideology, a true upholder of democracy.

holidays.title: Weston Koury’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is loved by his multitudes of followers and subscribers across his social media platforms.
